body_html:
A lot of cudaMalloc allocations go not through THCudaMalloc, and never get freed:

root@09b1476f201f:/workspace/ALL/playground# ltrace -x THCudaMalloc -x cudaMalloc -x THCudaFree -x cudaFree python rnnleak.py 
__libc_start_main(0x400980, 2, 0x7ffef64c9588, 0x400b60 <unfinished ...>
PyMem_RawMalloc(24, 0x7ffef64c9588, 0x7ffef64c95a0, 0)                = 0x24b3010
PyMem_RawMalloc(24, 0x24b3020, 0x24b3010, 0x7f17bea3f760)             = 0x24b3030
setlocale(LC_ALL, nil)                                                = "C"
_PyMem_RawStrdup(0x7f17be7fedf6, 0, 0x24b3030, 0x7f17bea3f760)        = 0x24b3050
setlocale(LC_ALL, "")                                                 = "C"
Py_DecodeLocale(0x7ffef64c98b1, 0, 1, 0)                              = 0x24b3070
Py_DecodeLocale(0x7ffef64c98b8, 0, 0x24b3088, 0)                      = 0x24b30a0
setlocale(LC_ALL, "C")                                                = "C"
PyMem_RawFree(0x24b3050, 1, 1, 0)                                     = 0
Py_Main(2, 0x24b3010, 0x7f17bea3f768, 0 <no return ...>
--- SIGCHLD (Child exited) ---
cudaMalloc@libcudart.so.8.0(0x7ffef64c7da0, 2097152)                  = 0
cudaMalloc@libcudart.so.8.0(0x7ffef64c8400, 2097152)                  = 0
cudaMalloc@libcudart.so.8.0(0x7ffef64c80b0, 1048576)                  = 0
cudaMalloc@libcudart.so.8.0(0x7ffef64c8400, 1048576)                  = 0
cudaMalloc@libcudart.so.8.0(0x7ffef64c80b0, 1048576)                  = 0

cudaMalloc@libcudart.so.8.0(0x7ffef64c8670, 1048576)                  = 0

cudaMalloc@libcudart.so.8.0(0x7ffef64c74d0, 156762112)                = 0

body_text:
A lot of cudaMalloc allocations go not through THCudaMalloc, and never get freed:
root@09b1476f201f:/workspace/ALL/playground# ltrace -x THCudaMalloc -x cudaMalloc -x THCudaFree -x cudaFree python rnnleak.py 
__libc_start_main(0x400980, 2, 0x7ffef64c9588, 0x400b60 <unfinished ...>
PyMem_RawMalloc(24, 0x7ffef64c9588, 0x7ffef64c95a0, 0)                = 0x24b3010
PyMem_RawMalloc(24, 0x24b3020, 0x24b3010, 0x7f17bea3f760)             = 0x24b3030
setlocale(LC_ALL, nil)                                                = "C"
_PyMem_RawStrdup(0x7f17be7fedf6, 0, 0x24b3030, 0x7f17bea3f760)        = 0x24b3050
setlocale(LC_ALL, "")                                                 = "C"
Py_DecodeLocale(0x7ffef64c98b1, 0, 1, 0)                              = 0x24b3070
Py_DecodeLocale(0x7ffef64c98b8, 0, 0x24b3088, 0)                      = 0x24b30a0
setlocale(LC_ALL, "C")                                                = "C"
PyMem_RawFree(0x24b3050, 1, 1, 0)                                     = 0
Py_Main(2, 0x24b3010, 0x7f17bea3f768, 0 <no return ...>
--- SIGCHLD (Child exited) ---

body:
A lot of cudaMalloc allocations go not through THCudaMalloc, and never get freed: 
```
root@09b1476f201f:/workspace/ALL/playground# ltrace -x THCudaMalloc -x cudaMalloc -x THCudaFree -x cudaFree python rnnleak.py 
__libc_start_main(0x400980, 2, 0x7ffef64c9588, 0x400b60 <unfinished ...>
PyMem_RawMalloc(24, 0x7ffef64c9588, 0x7ffef64c95a0, 0)                = 0x24b3010
PyMem_RawMalloc(24, 0x24b3020, 0x24b3010, 0x7f17bea3f760)             = 0x24b3030
setlocale(LC_ALL, nil)                                                = "C"
_PyMem_RawStrdup(0x7f17be7fedf6, 0, 0x24b3030, 0x7f17bea3f760)        = 0x24b3050
setlocale(LC_ALL, "")                                                 = "C"
Py_DecodeLocale(0x7ffef64c98b1, 0, 1, 0)                              = 0x24b3070
Py_DecodeLocale(0x7ffef64c98b8, 0, 0x24b3088, 0)                      = 0x24b30a0
setlocale(LC_ALL, "C")                                                = "C"
PyMem_RawFree(0x24b3050, 1, 1, 0)                                     = 0
Py_Main(2, 0x24b3010, 0x7f17bea3f768, 0 <no return ...>
--- SIGCHLD (Child exited) ---
cudaMalloc@libcudart.so.8.0(0x7ffef64c7da0, 2097152)                  = 0
```
